modName: Karate Kid Level Up Song Replacement - DELETED
summary: This mod will replace the lame level up sound with a more fitting iconic karate kid theme.
descriptionHtml: There isn't much to say here, It literally just replaces the level up song with a better, more bad-ass sound effect. Simply drag and drop into your data folder and if you want to uninstall the mod, delete the sound file.
author: MrTinklesworth

files.name: Karate Kid Theme Level up replacer
files.fileName: Karate Kid Theme Level up replacer-92889-1-0.zip
